damage, gain +2 Attack.

Unknown.name: Embrace Darkness
Unknown.text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
At the start of your turn,
gain control of it.
Unknown.flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

Unknown.name: Furnacefire Colossus
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
Unknown.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

Unknown.name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died_this turn.
Unknown.flavor: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

Unknown.name: Moorabi
Unknown.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
Unknown.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

Unknown.name: Necrotic Geist
Unknown.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Unknown.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

Unknown.name: Nerubian Unraveler
Unknown.text: Spells cost (2) more.
Unknown.flavor: He loves a good yarn.

Unknown.name: Shadow Essence
Unknown.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
Unknown.flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

Unknown.name: Skulking Geist
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Destroy all 1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
Unknown.flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

Unknown.name: Spectral Pillager
Unknown.text: [x]Combo: Deal damage equal to the number of other cards you've played this turn.
Unknown.flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

Unknown.name: Spellweaver
Unknown.text: Spell Damage +2
Unknown.flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

Unknown.name: Spreading Plague
Unknown.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
Unknown.flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

Unknown.name: Thing from Below
Unknown.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
Unknown.flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Shaman.

Unknown.name: Abominable Bowman
Unknown.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
Unknown.flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

Unknown.name: Ancient of War
Unknown.text: Choose One - +5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
Unknown.flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Druid.

Unknown.name: Archbishop Benedictus
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
Unknown.flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

Unknown.name: Barrens Stablehand
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Summon a random Beast.
Unknown.flavor: It’s never Huffer.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 2500 total wins.

Unknown.name: Bonemare
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
Unknown.flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

Unknown.name: Catrina Muerte
Unknown.text: At the end of your turn, resurrect another friendly Undead minion.
Unknown.flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Priest.

Unknown.name: Dr. Boom
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
Unknown.flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

Unknown.name: Enslaved Fel Lord
Unknown.text: Taunt. Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
Unknown.flavor: He's not really chained up. He just wears that to scare the imps when they get too unruly.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

Unknown.name: Firelands Portal
Unknown.text:
Deal $5 damage. Summon a random
5-Cost minion.
Unknown.flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

Unknown.name: Flamestrike
Unknown.text: Deal $5 damage to all enemy minions.
Unknown.flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Mage.

Unknown.name: Gorehowl
Unknown.text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
Unknown.flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Warrior.

Unknown.name: Guardian of Kings
Unknown.text: Taunt Battlecry: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
Unknown.flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Paladin.

Unknown.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
Unknown.text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
Unknown.flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

Unknown.name: Stormwatcher
Unknown.text: Windfury
Unknown.flavor: Aspiring meteorologist!
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Unknown.name: Arcane Devourer
Unknown.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
Unknown.flavor: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 2500 total wins.

Unknown.name: Enhanced Dreadlord
Unknown.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Dreadlord with Lifesteal.
Unknown.flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Warlock.

Unknown.name: Glacial Mysteries
Unknown.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Unknown.flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

Unknown.name: Natalie Seline
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
Unknown.flavor: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Priest.

Unknown.name: Ragnaros the Firelord
Unknown.text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
Unknown.flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.
Unknown.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 36 Classic Legendary cards.

Unknown.name: Rotface
Unknown.text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
Unknown.flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

Unknown.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
Unknown.flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

Unknown.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.
Unknown.flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

Unknown.name: Sindragosa
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
Unknown.flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

Unknown.name: The Lich King
Unknown.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Lich King card to your hand.
Unknown.flavor: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

Unknown.name: Frost Lich Jaina
Unknown.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
Unknown.flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

Unknown.name: Hadronox
Unknown.text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions that died this game.
Unknown.flavor: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

Unknown.name: Mal'Ganis
Unknown.text: Your other Demons have +2/+2. Your hero is Immune.
Unknown.flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.
Unknown.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Warlock.

Unknown.name: Obsidian Statue
Unknown.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Unknown.flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

Unknown.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
Unknown.flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

Unknown.name: Valeera the Hollow
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
Unknown.flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."

Unknown.name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
Unknown.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that_died_this_game.
Unknown.flavor: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

Unknown.name: Ultimate Infestation
Unknown.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage. Draw
5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.
Summon a 5/5 Ghoul.
Unknown.flavor: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

Unknown.name: Snowfury Giant
Unknown.text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
Unknown.flavor: This minion goes all the way to 11!

Unknown.name: Clockwork Giant
Unknown.text: Costs (1) less for each card in your opponent's hand.
Unknown.flavor: He and Mountain Giant don't get along.
